summary: Upgrade @grpc/grpc-js from ~1.7.3 to 1.8+ to address a security vulnerability (GHSA-cfgp-2977-2fmm), while handling conflicts with the integrated retry mechanism that would cause duplicate retries and validating the 10-second shutdown delay is resolved.
userImpact: Users are exposed to a security vulnerability in gRPC until the package is upgraded to a version with the fix.
rootCause: grpc-js versions < 1.8.8 contain a security vulnerability; upgrading requires reconciling duplicate retry mechanisms and validating shutdown behavior changes
proposedFix: Upgrade @grpc/grpc-js to 1.8+, validate the 10-second shutdown delay is resolved, and either remove the SDK's own retry mechanisms in favor of grpc-js' built-in retries or disable grpc-js' retry mechanisms to prevent duplication
resolutionDetails: Issue was addressed by upgrading the grpc-js dependency and handling retry mechanism integration
